title: PEG Knowledge Schema v3.2
description: Defines the structure for the agent's persistent knowledge base, including metadata for auditing and versioning.

version.description: Semantic version of the knowledge file.

description.description: A human-readable description of the file's purpose.

metadata.description: Contains metadata about the file, including update timestamps and an audit log.

created_at.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the file's creation.

updated_at.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the last modification.

operation_log.description: A log of all successful ingest operations.

item_id.description: The ID of the item that was operated on, or null for global operations.

knowledge_items.description: A list of all the individual knowledge items.

id.description: A unique identifier for the knowledge item.
